title: Every new pbe update is a dissapointment...
body: Because there is no new Cassiopeia skin :c when riot when?? Why is dah hate so huge to cass? {{champion:69}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
RiotKateyKhaos said they haven't forgotton about her. And skins should be released as part of a 'theme'.

 I honestly thought she would get some ice witch skin.. but oh well xd
